data.title: About Our Company
data.meta_description: ACL Digital is a design-led Digital Experience, Product Innovation, and Consulting services company enabling and accelerating innovation and transformation.
data.text:
As CEO, Ramandeep is driving the engineering teams and strategic planning activities for ACL Digital. He joined the ACL Digital management team from Aspire Communications, a subsidiary of ACL Digital. Ramandeep has over twenty years of experience in data networking, telecommunications, and semiconductor technologies. As a senior-level executive, he managed strategic planning, business development, engineering, and marketing-related activities at various companies.

Prior to joining Aspire, Ramandeep was Marketing and Operations Head at Luminous Networks. Ramandeep also served Corona Networks as the CEO. He was also a part of Nortel, Bay Networks, Mitsubishi, VLSI Technology, and LSI Logic. Ramandeep holds a B.S. and M.S. degree in Electrical Engineering.

Sai Satyam is the Chief Financial Officer of ACL Digital. He brings over 24 years of experience in global financial management, strategy implementation, mergers and acquisitions, and financial restructurings specific to the information technology sector, including professional services, software products, steel manufacturing, and consumer products. Having held financial management positions across high-tech companies, Sai oversees finance, legal & compliance, reporting, business planning, and accounting operations at ACL Digital.

Before joining ACL Digital in April 2011, Sai served as Chief Financial officer of California Software Co Ltd and CSWL Inc, a global software solutions provider. He also served as General Director (Finance and Accounts) for Melsons Group, a Moscow based trading conglomerate with extensive networks in the Russian Federation and Baltics. Prior to this, Sai was the Controller and Finance Director at Midland Galvanizing Products Ltd, Nigeria, and managed numerous strategic corporate initiatives involving corporate finance and accounting, business restructuring, and acquisitions.

Sai is an Associate Member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and a Fellow member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. He holds a bachelor’s degree in commerce and accounting from the University of Madras and is an active member of the IMA.

Sumesh Kaul is the Chief Revenue Officer at ACL Digital. Prior to joining ACL Digital, Sumesh was the President and Chief Operating Officer at AspireSoft, a subsidiary of ACL Digital. Having worked in variegated executive Product Management, Sales, and Business Development roles, he has over 20 years of industry experience in technology, product, and outsourcing services.

Before AspireSoft, Sumesh was associated with Corona Networks as the Head of Product Management and has served in various leadership capacities at Nortel, Bay Networks, and Oracle. Sumesh has also worked as the Editor at the IEEE Management 802.3z sub-task force. He holds a Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering from Windsor University, Canada, and a BS degree in Electronics and Communications from REC Trichy, India.

Suresh Venkateswaran is responsible for the strategic direction and business development of the Digital Engineering Solutions business unit of ACL Digital.

Suresh Venkateswaran brings over 25 years of technical and management experience in the software industry, with expertise in digital transformation, product design, and software development project methodologies across a diverse set of technology platforms and business domains. Since joining ACL Digital in 1996, Suresh has been instrumental in leading and architecting various product development and R&D initiatives of the technology division of ACL Digital.

Suresh holds an Engineering degree in Computer Science and an MBA in Information Systems.
